summary:
Highly experienced software engineer with 8+ years of experience as a freelancer, team member, and team lead. Skilled in designing and implementing robust software systems. Seeking a role that emphasizes teamwork, decision-making, creative problem solving.

In addition to my extensive experience as a software engineer, I have a deep passion for data mining, recommender systems, software engineering, machine learning, and full-stack development. I have dedicated considerable time and effort to gaining expertise in these areas, constantly expanding my knowledge through research, practical projects, and continuous learning.

skills.Frameworks & Libraries: sckitlearn, pytorch, nuxt.js, vue.js, tailwindCSS, Bootstrap ...

skills.Databases & Storage: BigQuery, S3, GCS, SQL, NoSQL, Redis, MongoDB, Cassandra...

skills.DevOps & Deployment: Linux, Docker, Nginx, HAProxy, Gitlab CI/CD, (learning AWS now), ...
